```{r ausbeer}
library(fpp2)
library(TTR)
library(forecast)


head(ausbeer)
plot(ausbeer)

# Seasonally Adjusted:

stl(ausbeer,s.window = "periodic")
stl_decomp <- stl(ausbeer, s.window ="periodic")
plot(stl_decomp)
attributes(stl_decomp)
seasadj(stl_decomp)
f_stl <- forecast(stl_decomp)
plot(f_stl)
f_stl <- forecast(stl_decomp, h=15)
plot(f_stl)


# Decompose

decompose(ausbeer)
decomp_ausbeer <- decompose(ausbeer)
plot(decomp_ausbeer)
attributes(decomp_ausbeer)





```
